#summary A list of applications that use OpenMeta.
#labels Featured,Phase-Support

= Introduction =

This is a list of applications that support the reading and/or writing of OpenMeta Tags. Applications that only search OpenMeta Tags are listed under the subsection "Partial Support".


= Supporting Applications =
*Ironic Software:*
*TagIt*: http://www.ironicsoftware.com/tagit/index.html

*Deep*: http://www.ironicsoftware.com/deep/index.html

*Leap 2*: http://www.ironicsoftware.com/Leap

*Fresh*: http://www.ironicsoftware.com/fresh/index.html

*Gravity Applications:*
*Tags*: http://gravityapps.com/tags/ _(effectively, although not really OpenMeta)_

*St.Clair Software:*
*Default Folder X*: http://www.stclairsoft.com/DefaultFolderX/

*Jon Stovell:*
*Tag Folders*: http://tagfolders.vndv.com/

*Onflapp:*
*Tagoman*: http://onflapp.wordpress.com/tagoman/ 

*Ali Rantakari:*
*Tagger*: http://hasseg.org/tagger/

*Nudge Nudge:*
*Punakea*: http://www.nudgenudge.eu/punakea

*MOApp:*
*myDocuments*: http://myownapp.com/site/moapp3.0/applications_leo/tools/myDocuments/myDocuments.html

*myTexts*: http://myownapp.com/site/moapp3.0/applications_leo/writing/mytexts/mytexts.html
_(OMTags are written on export)_
